bugs.summary: Remove some always-on / always-off prefs.
Viewing a CloudApp screen recording does not work in Firefox
Support SetTimeout deferral during load in Fission
Minor nsDocumentViewer cleanup.
Various minor cleanups.
Zooming with ctrl-wheel_scroll works on text but not other areas inside a button
Report CheckMayLoad errors to the web console, not just the browser console
Enable Feature Policy allow attribute and permission delegation by default
Cannot log into thestar.com
CheckLoadURI failures should be reported to the web console as needed
Implement AVX variation of ICCv2 transforms
Enable Webrender for Adreno 5xx and 6xx in Nightly
Expose partial present usage to about:support
Investigate why we rasterize glyphs so often
Intermittent org.mozilla.geckoview.test.ZZAccessibilityTest.testAccessibilityFocus | application crashed [@ mozilla::Logger::~Logger()]
Intermittent image/test/mochitest/test_animated_gif.html | `loadComplete` should be received once - got +0, expected 1
Make LazyScriptCreationData owned by FunctionCreationData
Clang-format js/ again
Don't track property types for ListObject
Generate target.json for spidermonkey shell builds
[jsdbg2] Debugger.Objects for promises should provide reaction records
Remove some unused functions in js/src/vm
Update test262, Dec 2019
Implement ReadableStream.prototype.pipeTo and pipeThrough
Implement WeakRef objects in the JS shell
Investigate tidying up StackGCCellPtr
fission iframes that are scrolled far out of view and not painted or visible are set to active
nsFontFaceUtils::MarkDirtyForFontChange spends too much time doing string conversion
MOZ_LITTLE_ENDIAN and MOZ_BIG_ENDIAN should be function-like macros
DNS search suffix list is not being parsed by Firefox if set via gpedit
division by zero in src/gfx/layers/apz/src/AsyncPanZoomController.cpp:3377
Print preview is broken after making any settings changes
Set disable_dbm to true on Firefox builds
Reduce state in dom/indexedDB classes
Assertion failure: mDirectoryLock, at /builds/worker/workspace/build/src/dom/indexedDB/ActorsParent.cpp:12589
Make current session storage implementation Fission-compatible
Investigate the SDP parsing failure in wpt RTCTrackEvent-fire.html
FxR PC Preview UI tweaks
Remove "context" function from JS TouchBarInputs
[Linux] Use DevicePixelsToGdkCoordRoundUp() to calculate un-scaled coordinates
[Linux] Remove logging from ApplySizeConstraints/UpdateOpaqueRegion
[Linux] Cache GetCSDDecorationSize() results to be faster
[Linux] When system titlebar is disabled on HiDPI/X11, content menu is misplaced
Crash in [@ PR_GetThreadID | mozilla::UntrustedModulesProcessor::Enqueue]

Enable WatchPoints in all channels
Simplify devtools/server/actors/object/previewers.js and remove eslint-disable complexity
Remove DebuggerClient.connect onConnected param
Cleanup Omniscient Browser Toobox strings and messages
Remove DebuggerClient.close onClosed parameter
Simplify DevTools LocalTabTargetFront
Omniscient Browser Toolbox error when closing a tab "this._stopThreadFrontListeners is not a function"
Devtools incorrectly says that grid properties don't apply to abspos descendant
Attempts to display blocked resources with no blocking reason leak
Handle full-page zooming for embedded RDM UI
Properly reject in async-storage.js
Return a function from EventEmitter.on that removes the event listener when called
expandTextOnFocus pref disappeared from about:config
Address bar vertical expansion covers the contextual identities (containers) tab underline color
Make UrlbarInput::trimValue private

Perma browser/components/urlbar/tests/unit/test_UrlbarQueryContext_restrictSource.js | test_restrictions - [test_restrictions : 73] ["engine-suggestions.xml... when Gecko 73 merges to Beta on 2020-01-06

History Sidebar view mode is initialized when update today's Nightly
Capture attempts to load content from outside the ssb and redirect them to the main browser
Launching a site specific browser logs "Invalid string label" to the console
When available load a site's manifest and use its scope property
Support updating a SSB's manifest after creation
Test Snippets do not generate telemetry events for any interactions if triggered via AS router
Skew on-sync recipe runs to avoid crushing servers

privateBrowsingId is added to the link in  Settings  - Autoplay in Preferences
